title: Add name scope to tf.image
body_html:
This PR fixes #1560
I searched through the tf.image API list and found the following APIs need to add name scope

crop_to_bounding_box
pad_to_bounding_box
flip_left_right
random_flip_left_right
flip_up_down
random_flip_up_down
per_image_standardization
central_crop
resize_images
resize_image_with_crop_or_pad
transpose_image

@martinwicke Thanks for quick reply before and could you please take a look?

  • Add name scope to above functions
  • Add test case(s)

RELNOTES: Add name scopes to tf.image functions.

body:
This PR fixes #1560 
I searched through the tf.image API list and found the following APIs need to add name scope

> crop_to_bounding_box
> pad_to_bounding_box
> flip_left_right
> random_flip_left_right
> flip_up_down
> random_flip_up_down
> per_image_standardization
> central_crop
> resize_images
> resize_image_with_crop_or_pad
> transpose_image

@martinwicke Thanks for quick reply before and could you please take a look?

- [x] Add name scope to above functions
- [x] Add test case(s)

RELNOTES: Add name scopes to tf.image functions.
